General.Name: HAGA S/A Indústria e Comércio
General.Description: HAGA S/A Indústria e Comércio engages in the manufacture and sale of locks, hinges, and other accessories for doors in Brazil. It offers electronic and overlap locks, as well as locks for furniture products; and handles and add-ons. The company was founded in 1937 and is based in Nova Friburgo, Brazil.
General.Address: Avenida Engenheiro Hans Gaiser, 26, Nova Friburgo, RJ, Brazil, 28605-220
